subject: Relationships
title: Difficult Conversations: Money, Kids, and the Future
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Difficult Conversations: Money, Kids, and the Future.

hook.text: 70% of couples avoid talking about money. It's the number one cause of divorce. Silence is expensive.

buildup.text: Money, children, religion, and life goals are the 'big four' topics couples avoid until crisis forces them.

discovery.text: Couples who discuss these topics before engagement have a 30% lower divorce rate.

twist.text: The conversation itself matters less than the willingness to have it. Avoidance signals a deeper problem.

climax.text: Difficult conversations are relationship insurance. Uncomfortable now saves catastrophic later.

punchline.text: The conversations you avoid become the problems you can't solve.

quiz.question: What is the number one financial cause of divorce?
